name: Hell Firefighter
description:
Sometimes it gets boring in hell, and demons come to the earthly realm to wreak havoc and harvest fresh souls. This time, the servants of hell fancied to possess a regular fireman and send him on a murderous hit-and-run spree behind the wheel of a heavy fire engine.
This fireman is you.

This game features:
- Drive a fire truck.
- Destroy all on you way.
- Collect souls killed you people.
- Violent rampage through busy road in the hunt for innocent souls.
- Simple but engaging gameplay in an atmosphere of infernal madness.
- Corrosive remarks of your demonic handler.
- And a good deal of cynical fun.

Take the wheel and cause some mayhem in this peaceful world!
